description: List rate agreement copier works with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Results are limited by RateAgreementCopierWorkPolicy scope, which restricts access to copier works tied to rate agreements the user can access via the RateAgreement policy scope.
validation_notes: target-organization-type accepts Customer or Trucker (case-insensitive; plural forms are normalized).

flags.name: --rate-agreement-template
flags.description: Filter by rate agreement template ID

flags.name: --target-organization-type
flags.description: Filter by target organization type (Customer, Trucker)
flags.validation: Customer or Trucker (case-insensitive; plural forms accepted).
